title: Anno 117 Calculator Parameters
description: Generated schema for Anno 117 calculator parameters

fuelProductionTime.description: How long does 1t of this product activate a production in seconds

fuelProduct.description: which product can be used as fuel

regions.title: Region
regions.description: Game regions data with GUID, name, icon, and localized text

sessions.title: Session
sessions.description: Game session information including region associations

needs.title: Need
needs.description: Population group definitions with associated levels

populationGroups.title: PopulationGroup
populationGroups.description: Population group definitions with associated levels

residenceBuildings.title: ResidenceBuilding
residenceBuildings.description: Residence building for a population level

populationLevels.title: PopulationLevel
populationLevels.description: Population level definitions with needs and requirements

productFilters.title: ProductFilter
productFilters.description: Product category filters for UI organization

factories.title: Factory
factories.description: Factory building definitions with inputs, outputs, maintenances, and production rates

modules.title: Module
modules.description: Modules attachable to factories with inputs, maintenances, and production rates

buildingBuffs.title: BuildingBuff
buildingBuffs.description: Building buff assets with upgrade properties for buildings, residences, and factories. Determine what the effect is. See effects for where they apply.

effects.title: Effect
effects.description: Building buff combined with targets (pool of building GUIDs).

techs.title: Tech
techs.description: Technologies from the discovery tree with relevant effects

patrons.title: Patrons
patrons.description: Patrons with effects increased by devotion.

items.title: Item
items.description: Items equipable in Villa with relevant buffs.

icons.title: Icon
icons.description: Icon data URLs indexed by icon identifier

texts.title: Text
texts.description: Texts from the game with localization.
